BSP-01.Question-text: Is the DAO 's Gini Coefficient for economic tokens less than or equal to fifty percent ( <= 50%)?

BSP-02.Question-text: Is the Banzhaf Index for each individual member less than or equal to twenty-five percent (<= 25.0%)?

BSP-03.Question-text: Does the DAO explicitly state that private communication channels are for sensitive or confidential matters?

BSP-04.Question-text: Does the DAO explicitly require members to verify that they have a unique digital identity?

BSP-05.Question-text: Does the DAO have any leadership roles?

BSP-06.Question-text: Does the DAO have any management roles?

BSP-07.Question-text: Does the DAO require members to adhere to a standard of conduct, such as described in a code of conduct?

BSP-08.Question-text: Does the DAO provide a glossary of internal terms?

BSP-09.Question-text: Does the DAO use a participatory governance model?

BSP-10.Question-text: Does the DAO have an explicitly defined dispute resolution mechanism?

BSP-11.Question-text: Does the DAO have a shared ownership model?

BSP-12.Question-text: Does the DAO have a well-defined procedure for how members can take defined leadership or management roles?

BSP-13.Question-text: Does the DAO provide members multifaceted activities to receive rewards?

CBC-01.Question-text: Does the DAO have leadership from multiple geographic regions?

CBC-02.Question-text: Does the DAO have members in multiple geographic regions?

CBC-03.Question-text: Does the DAO have managers from multiple geographic regions?

PDC-01.Question-text: Does the DAO have a collective treasury (or multisig account)?

PDC-02.Question-text: Does the DAO have currencies recognizing value beyond financial relations, such as labor, contributor well-being, or environmental impact?

PDC-03.Question-text: Does the DAO have a collective membership mark to signify membership in the DAO?

PDC-04.Question-text: Does the DAO redistribute profits/surplus on a basis other than capital holdings?

PDC-05.Question-text: Does the DAO have any accountability mechanisms that subject the power of leaders and managers to the members?

PDC-06.Question-text: Does the DAO have an amendment procedure for its rules, procedures or policies?

PDC-07.Question-text: Does the DAO have a decision-making matrix?

PDC-08.Question-text: Does the DAO have metrics beyond governance and finance, such as contributor well-being or happiness?

PDC-09.Question-text: Does the DAO have separate tokens for governance and economic rights?

PDC-10.Question-text: Does the DAO not make governance tokens tradeable?

PDC-11.Question-text: Does the DAO provide education and training opportunities for members to meaningful participate in governance?

CPB-01.Question-text: Does the DAO publish content on its activites in its' public channels?

CPB-02.Question-text: Does the DAO make an explicit, clearly articulated statement of its purpose, values and norms?

IDA-01.Question-text: Does the DAO provide an organizational analytics dashboard?

IDA-02.Question-text: Does the DAO make its governance activities (e.g., proposals, decisions) publicly accessible at free to low-cost?

IDA-03.Question-text: Does the DAO make its organizational documents (bylaws, policies, strategic plan, etc.) publicly accessible at free to low-cost?

IDA-04.Question-text: Does the DAO make its technologies open source or source available, and publicly accessible at free to low-cost?

IDA-05.Question-text: Does the DAO explicitly report whether any Web3 tools it uses, internally or externally, have been audited?

IDA-06.Question-text: Does the DAO explicitly state that it operates on, or interacts with, more than one (1) blockchain?

IDA-07.Question-text: Does the DAO explicitly describe it’s financial incentive or compensation structure for contributors?

D2D-01.Question-text: Does the DAO have any planned transactions with another DAO?

D2D-02.Question-text: Does the DAO have any current transactions with another DAO?

OT-01.Question-text: Does the DAO currently use any Web3 organizational technology for business-to-business operations?

OT-02.Question-text: Does the DAO currently use any Web3 organizational technology for treasury management?

OT-03.Question-text: Does the DAO currently use any Web3 organizational technology for contribution-tracking?

OT-04.Question-text: Does the DAO currently use any Web3 organizational technology for decision-making?

HCAG-01.Question-text: Does the DAO explicitly acknowledge the possible vulnerabilities of algorithmic decision-making?

HCAG-02.Question-text: Does the DAO educate its members on the development and use of algorithms, as they pertain to the DAO?

HCAG-03.Question-text: Does the DAO explicitly consider the short- and long-term social consequences of the algorithmic systems in the development and use of algorithms?
